basics.name: Yocxy De la Cruz Miguez
basics.label: Computer Science Engineer
basics.summary: Computer Science Engineer with experience in software development, network administration, and economic systems. Skilled in technologies such as Java, ASP.NET, C#, PHP, SQL, and more. Experience working with multinational and local companies. Certified in AWS and highly skilled in database management and IT security. Currently learning Rust & Astro. I live in Montevideo, Uruguay.

work.name: PackExpress Uruguay SAS
work.summary: Managed hosting servers, developed websites and an online store, handled banking accounts, and developed the invoicing system in ASP.NET C#, PHP, and JavaScript with barcodes and QR codes.
highlights: Developed web applications using ASP.NET C#.
Implemented an invoicing system with QR and barcodes.
